message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to save some money.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm still interested in making a deal, but I need to be careful with my budget.
